title: England’s bloody Reformation
itunes:title: England’s bloody Reformation
itunes:subtitle: As we near the 500th anniversary of the European Reformation, Professor Peter Marshall explores how the events impacted on England. He explains how Henry VIII’s break with Rome led to many decades of violence
description:
As we near the 500th anniversary of the European Reformation, Professor Peter Marshall explores how the events impacted on England. He explains how Henry VIII’s break with Rome led to many decades of violence

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
